'''Rudibert Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Rudibert was the second son of [[Adalgar Bolger]]. He married [[Amethyst Hornblower]] and they had one child together, [[Adalbert Bolger]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>
